children.subject:
If you are going to ask a question like that, please post it in the discussion, not in student's answer. Otherwise, people are going to think that this has been resolved.

To answer your question, it's for data science education program.
Thank you! I just sent you an email!

Hello! I'm part of DSEP (Data Science Education Program), sorry for the delay in emails, we got a lot of applications this semester! Could you email me your name to gunjan_baid@berkeley.edu? I can get back to you with some more information regarding the status of your application.

history.content:
Hi, I got an email from data science research program about two days ago (Tuesday) if I was interested in joining one.

After I accepted on that day, I asked time for interview and the staff said he's open Wednesday morning, which was yesterday.

I then asked if 10 AM was a good time, but haven't gotten a response since then, even after sending another on Tuesday night just in case.

I know that it's only been two days and the research staff is extremely busy, but I am a bit worry that I might lose this opportunity as most of research positions are getting filled.

Should I just wait for a response or try contacting him directly (not sure how though)...
history.subject: No response after getting selected for research interview...

history.content:
Hi, I got an email from data science research program about three days ago (Tuesday) if I was interested in joining one.

After I accepted on that day, I asked time for interview and the staff said he's open Wednesday morning, which was two days ago. 

I then asked if 10 AM was a good time, but haven't gotten a response since then, even after sending another on Tuesday night just in case.

I know that it's only been two days and the research staff is extremely busy, but I am a bit worry that I might lose this opportunity as most of research positions are getting filled.

Should I just wait for a response or try contacting him directly (not sure how though)...
history.subject: No response after getting selected for research interview...
